accommodation.title: Open Data Hub Tourism Api - Accommodation

parameters.name: pagenumber
parameters.description: Pagenumber

parameters.name: pagesize
parameters.description: Elements per Page (If availabilitycheck set, pagesize has no effect all Accommodations are returned), (default:10)

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description: Seed '1 - 10' for Random Sorting, '0' generates a Random Seed, 'null' disables Random Sorting, (default:null)

parameters.name: categoryfilter
parameters.description: Categoryfilter BITMASK values: 1 = (not categorized), 2 = (1star), 4 = (1flower), 8 = (1sun), 14 = (1star/1flower/1sun), 16 = (2stars), 32 = (2flowers), 64 = (2suns), 112 = (2stars/2flowers/2suns), 128 = (3stars), 256 = (3flowers), 512 = (3suns), 1024 = (3sstars), 1920 = (3stars/3flowers/3suns/3sstars), 2048 = (4stars), 4096 = (4flowers), 8192 = (4suns), 16384 = (4sstars), 30720 = (4stars/4flowers/4suns/4sstars), 32768 = (5stars), 65536 = (5flowers), 131072 = (5suns), 229376 = (5stars/5flowers/5suns), 'null' = (No Filter), (default:'null')

parameters.name: typefilter
parameters.description: Typefilter BITMASK values: 1 = (HotelPension), 2 = (BedBreakfast), 4 = (Farm), 8 = (Camping), 16 = (Youth), 32 = (Mountain), 64 = (Apartment), 128 = (Not defined),'null' = (No Filter), (default:'null')

parameters.name: boardfilter
parameters.description: Boardfilter BITMASK values: 0 = (all boards), 1 = (without board), 2 = (breakfast), 4 = (half board), 8 = (full board), 16 = (All inclusive), 'null' = (No Filter), (default:'null')

parameters.name: featurefilter
parameters.description: FeatureFilter BITMASK values: 1 = (Group-friendly), 2 = (Meeting rooms), 4 = (Swimming pool), 8 = (Sauna), 16 = (Garage), 32 = (Pick-up service), 64 = (WLAN), 128 = (Barrier-free), 256 = (Special menus for allergy sufferers), 512 = (Pets welcome), 'null' = (No Filter), (default:'null')

parameters.name: featureidfilter
parameters.description: Feature Id Filter, LIST filter over ALL Features available. Separator ',' List of Feature IDs, 'null' = (No Filter), (default:'null')

parameters.name: themefilter
parameters.description: Themefilter BITMASK values: 1 = (Gourmet), 2 = (At altitude), 4 = (Regional wellness offerings), 8 = (on the wheels), 16 = (With family), 32 = (Hiking), 64 = (In the vineyards), 128 = (Urban vibe), 256 = (At the ski resort), 512 = (Mediterranean), 1024 = (In the Dolomites), 2048 = (Alpine), 4096 = (Small and charming), 8192 = (Huts and mountain inns), 16384 = (Rural way of life), 32768 = (Balance), 65536 = (Christmas markets), 131072 = (Sustainability), 'null' = (No Filter), (default:'null')

parameters.name: badgefilter
parameters.description: BadgeFilter BITMASK values: 1 = (Belvita Wellness Hotel), 2 = (Familyhotel), 4 = (Bikehotel), 8 = (Red Rooster Farm), 16 = (Barrier free certificated), 32 = (Vitalpina Hiking Hotel), 64 = (Private Rooms in South Tyrol), 128 = (Vinum Hotels), 'null' = (No Filter), (default:'null')

parameters.name: idfilter
parameters.description: IDFilter LIST Separator ',' List of Accommodation IDs, 'null' = (No Filter), (default:'null')

parameters.name: locfilter
parameters.description: Locfilter SPECIAL Separator ',' possible values: reg + REGIONID = (Filter by Region), reg + REGIONID = (Filter by Region), tvs + TOURISMVEREINID = (Filter by Tourismverein), mun + MUNICIPALITYID = (Filter by Municipality), fra + FRACTIONID = (Filter by Fraction), 'null' = (No Filter), (default:'null') Wiki locfilter

parameters.name: altitudefilter
parameters.description: Altitude Range Filter SPECIAL (Separator ',' example Value: 500,1000 Altitude from 500 up to 1000 metres), (default:'null')

parameters.name: odhtagfilter
parameters.description: ODHTag Filter LIST (refers to Array SmgTags) (String, Separator ',' more ODHTags possible, 'null' = No Filter, available ODHTags reference to 'v1/ODHTag?validforentity=accommodation'), (default:'null')

parameters.name: odhactive
parameters.description: ODHActive Filter BOOLEAN (refers to field SmgActive) (possible Values: 'null' Displays all Accommodations, 'true' only ODH Active Accommodations, 'false' only ODH Disabled Accommodations), (default:'null')

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: TIC Active Filter BOOLEAN (possible Values: 'null' Displays all Accommodations, 'true' only TIC Active Accommodations, 'false' only TIC Disabled Accommodations), (default:'null')

parameters.name: arrival
parameters.description: Arrival DATE (yyyy-MM-dd) REQUIRED ON Availabilitycheck = true, (default:'Today's date')

parameters.name: departure
parameters.description: Departure DATE (yyyy-MM-dd) REQUIRED ON Availabilitycheck = true, (default:'Tomorrow's date')

parameters.name: roominfo
parameters.description: Roominfo Filter REQUIRED ON Availabilitycheck = true (Splitter for Rooms '|' Splitter for Persons Ages ',') (Room Types: 0=notprovided, 1=room, 2=apartment, 4=pitch/tent(onlyLTS), 8=dorm(onlyLTS)) possible Values Example 1-18,10|1-18 = 2 Rooms, Room 1 for 2 person Age 18 and Age 10, Room 2 for 1 Person Age 18), (default:'1-18,18')

parameters.name: bokfilter
parameters.description: Booking Channels Filter REQUIRED ON Availabilitycheck = true (Separator ',' possible values: hgv = (Booking Südtirol), htl = (Hotel.de), exp = (Expedia), bok = (Booking.com), lts = (LTS Availability check)), (default:'hgv')

parameters.name: msssource
parameters.description: Source for MSS availability check, (default:'sinfo')

parameters.name: availabilitychecklanguage
parameters.description: Language of the Availability Response (possible values: 'de','it','en')

parameters.name: detail
parameters.description: Detail of the Availablity check (string, 1 = full Details, 0 = basic Details (default))

parameters.name: availabilitycheck
parameters.description: Availability Check BOOLEAN (possible Values: 'true', 'false), (default Value: 'false') NOT AVAILABLE AS OPEN DATA, IF Availabilty Check is true certain filters are Required

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: GeoFilter FLOAT Latitude Format: '46.624975', 'null' = disabled, (default:'null') Wiki geosort

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: GeoFilter FLOAT Longitude Format: '11.369909', 'null' = disabled, (default:'null') Wiki geosort

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Radius INTEGER to Search in Meters. Only Object withhin the given point and radius are returned and sorted by distance. Random Sorting is disabled if the GeoFilter Informations are provided, (default:'null') Wiki geosort

parameters.name: polygon
parameters.description: valid WKT (Well-known text representation of geometry) Format, Examples (POLYGON ((30 10, 40 40, 20 40, 10 20, 30 10))) / By Using the GeoShapes Api (v1/GeoShapes) and passing Country.Type.Id OR Country.Type.Name Example (it.municipality.3066) / Bounding Box Filter bbc: 'Bounding Box Contains', 'bbi': 'Bounding Box Intersects', followed by a List of Comma Separated Longitude Latitude Tuples, 'null' = disabled, (default:'null') Wiki geosort

parameters.name: publishedon
parameters.description: Published On Filter (Separator ',' List of publisher IDs), (default:'null')

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language field selector, displays data and fields in the selected language, possible values: 'de|it|en|nl|cs|pl|fr|ru' only one language supported (default:'null' all languages are displayed)

parameters.name: langfilter
parameters.description: Language filter (returns only data available in the selected Language, Separator ',' possible values: 'de,it,en,nl,sc,pl,fr,ru', 'null': Filter disabled)

parameters.name: updatefrom
parameters.description: Returns data changed after this date Format (yyyy-MM-dd), (default: 'null')

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Select fields to display, More fields are indicated by separator ',' example fields=Id,Active,Shortname (default:'null' all fields are displayed). Wiki fields

parameters.name: searchfilter
parameters.description: String to search for, Title in all languages are searched, (default: null) Wiki searchfilter

parameters.name: rawfilter
parameters.description: Wiki rawfilter

parameters.name: rawsort
parameters.description: Wiki rawsort

parameters.name: removenullvalues
parameters.description: Remove all Null values from json output. Useful for reducing json size. By default set to false. Documentation on Opendatahub Wiki

parameters.name: getasidarray
parameters.description: Get result only as Array of Ids, (default:false) Documentation on Opendatahub Wiki

parameters.description: ID of the Accommodation

parameters.name: idsource
parameters.description: ID Source Filter (possible values:'lts','hgv','a0r_id'), (default:'lts')

parameters.description: Boardfilter BITMASK values: 0 = (all boards), 1 = (without board), 2 = (breakfast), 4 = (half board), 8 = (full board), 16 = (All inclusive), 'null' = (No Filter), (default:'null')

parameters.name: departure

parameters.name: roominfo
parameters.description: Roominfo Filter REQUIRED (Splitter for Rooms '|' Splitter for Persons Ages ',') (Room Types: 0=notprovided, 1=room, 2=apartment, 4=pitch/tent(onlyLTS), 8=dorm(onlyLTS)) possible Values Example 1-18,10|1-18 = 2 Rooms, Room 1 for 2 person Age 18 and Age 10, Room 2 for 1 Person Age 18), (default:'1-18,18')

parameters.name: bokfilter
parameters.description: Booking Channels Filter REQUIRED (Separator ',' possible values: hgv = (Booking Südtirol), htl = (Hotel.de), exp = (Expedia), bok = (Booking.com), lts = (LTS Availability check)), (default:'hgv')

parameters.name: availabilitycheck

odhactivitypoi.title: Open Data Hub Tourism Api - ODHActivityPoi

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language field selector, displays data and fields available in the selected language (default:'null' all languages are displayed)

parameters.name: pagenumber
parameters.description: Pagenumber

parameters.name: pagesize
parameters.description: Elements per Page, (default:10)

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of the ODHActivityPoi ('null' = Filter disabled, possible values: BITMASK: 1 = Wellness, 2 = Winter, 4 = Summer, 8 = Culture, 16 = Other, 32 = Gastronomy, 64 = Mobility, 128 = Shops and services), (default: 255 == ALL), refers to ODHActivityPoi Types, Type: Type

parameters.name: activitytype
parameters.description: Filtering by Activity Type defined by LTS ('null' = Filter disabled, possible values: BITMASK: 'Mountains = 1','Cycling = 2','Local tours = 4','Horses = 8','Hiking = 16','Running and fitness = 32','Cross-country ski-track = 64','Tobbogan run = 128','Slopes = 256','Lifts = 512'), (default:'1023' == ALL), , refers to ActivityTypes, Type: Type

parameters.name: poitype
parameters.description: Filtering by Poi Type defined by LTS ('null' = Filter disabled, possible values: BITMASK 'Doctors, Pharmacies = 1','Shops = 2','Culture and sights= 4','Nightlife and entertainment = 8','Public institutions = 16','Sports and leisure = 32','Traffic and transport = 64', 'Service providers' = 128, 'Craft' = 256, 'Associations' = 512, 'Companies' = 1024), (default:'2047' == ALL), , refers to PoiTypes, Type: Type

parameters.name: subtype
parameters.description: Subtype of the ODHActivityPoi ('null' = Filter disabled, BITMASK Filter, available SubTypes depends on the selected Maintype) ODHActivityPoi SubTypes, or Activity SubTypes, or Poi SubTypes, Type: SubType

parameters.name: level3type
parameters.description: Additional Type of Level 3 the ODHActivityPoi ('null' = Filter disabled, BITMASK Filter, available SubTypes depends on the selected Maintype, SubType reference to ODHActivityPoiTypes)

parameters.name: idlist
parameters.description: IDFilter (Separator ',' List of ODHActivityPoi IDs), (default:'null')

parameters.name: locfilter
parameters.description: Locfilter SPECIAL Separator ',' possible values: reg + REGIONID = (Filter by Region), reg + REGIONID = (Filter by Region), tvs + TOURISMVEREINID = (Filter by Tourismverein), mun + MUNICIPALITYID = (Filter by Municipality), fra + FRACTIONID = (Filter by Fraction), 'null' = (No Filter), (default:'null') Wiki locfilter

parameters.name: langfilter
parameters.description: ODHActivityPoi Langfilter (returns only SmgPois available in the selected Language, Separator ',' possible values: 'de,it,en,nl,sc,pl,fr,ru', 'null': Filter disabled)

parameters.name: areafilter
parameters.description: AreaFilter (Alternate Locfilter, can be combined with locfilter) (Separator ',' possible values: reg + REGIONID = (Filter by Region), tvs + TOURISMASSOCIATIONID = (Filter by Tourismassociation), skr + SKIREGIONID = (Filter by Skiregion), ska + SKIAREAID = (Filter by Skiarea), are + AREAID = (Filter by LTS Area), 'null' = No Filter), (default:'null')

parameters.name: highlight
parameters.description: Hightlight Filter (possible values: 'false' = only ODHActivityPoi with Highlight false, 'true' = only ODHActivityPoi with Highlight true), (default:'null')

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Source Filter (possible Values: 'null' Displays all ODHActivityPoi, 'None', 'ActivityData', 'PoiData', 'GastronomicData', 'MuseumData', 'Magnolia', 'Content', 'SuedtirolWein', 'ArchApp'), (default:'null')

parameters.name: odhtagfilter
parameters.description: ODH Taglist Filter (refers to Array SmgTags) (String, Separator ',' more Tags possible (OR FILTER), available Tags reference to 'v1/ODHTag?validforentity=odhactivitypoi'), (default:'null')

parameters.name: odhtagfilter_and
parameters.description: ODH Taglist Filter (refers to Array SmgTags) (String, Separator ',' more Tags possible (AND FILTER), available Tags reference to 'v1/ODHTag?validforentity=odhactivitypoi'), (default:'null')

parameters.name: odhactive
parameters.description: ODH Active (Published) ODHActivityPoi Filter (Refers to field OdhActive) (possible Values: 'true' only published ODHActivityPoi, 'false' only not published ODHActivityPoi), (default:'null')

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Active ODHActivityPoi Filter (possible Values: 'true' only active ODHActivityPoi, 'false' only not active ODHActivityPoi), (default:'null')

parameters.name: categorycodefilter
parameters.description: CategoryCode Filter (Only for ODHActivityTypes of type Gastronomy) (BITMASK) refers to GastronomyTypes, Type: CategoryCodes

parameters.name: dishcodefilter
parameters.description: DishCode Filter (Only for ODHActivityTypes of type Gastronomy) (BITMASK) refers to GastronomyTypes, Type: DishCodes

parameters.name: ceremonycodefilter
parameters.description: CeremonyCode Filter (Only for ODHActivityTypes of type Gastronomy) (BITMASK) refers to GastronomyTypes, Type: CeremonyCodes

parameters.name: facilitycodefilter
parameters.description: FacilityCode Filter (Only for ODHActivityTypes of type Gastronomy) (BITMASK) refers to GastronomyTypes, Type: with FacilityCodes_ prefix

parameters.name: cuisinecodefilter
parameters.description: CuisineCode Filter (Only for ODHActivityTypes of type Gastronomy) (BITMASK) refers to GastronomyTypes, Type: CuisineCodes

parameters.name: difficultyfilter
parameters.description: Difficulty Filter (possible values: '1' = easy, '2' = medium, '3' = difficult), (default:'null')

parameters.name: distancefilter
parameters.description: Distance Range Filter (Separator ',' example Value: 15,40 Distance from 15 up to 40 Km), (default:'null')

parameters.name: altitudefilter
parameters.description: Altitude Range Filter (Separator ',' example Value: 500,1000 Altitude from 500 up to 1000 metres), (default:'null')

parameters.name: durationfilter
parameters.description: Duration Range Filter (Separator ',' example Value: 1,3 Duration from 1 to 3 hours), (default:'null')

parameters.name: tagfilter
parameters.description: Filter on Tags. Syntax =and/or(TagSource.TagId,TagSource.TagId,TagId) example or(idm.summer,lts.hiking) - and(idm.themed hikes,lts.family hikings) - or(hiking) - and(idm.summer) - Combining and/or is not supported at the moment, default: 'null')

parameters.name: publishedon
parameters.description: Published On Filter (Separator ',' List of publisher IDs), (default:'null')

parameters.name: updatefrom
parameters.description: Returns data changed after this date Format (yyyy-MM-dd), (default: 'null')

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description: Seed '1 - 10' for Random Sorting, '0' generates a Random Seed, not provided disables Random Sorting, (default:'null')

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: GeoFilter FLOAT Latitude Format: '46.624975', 'null' = disabled, (default:'null') Wiki geosort

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: GeoFilter FLOAT Longitude Format: '11.369909', 'null' = disabled, (default:'null') Wiki geosort

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Radius INTEGER to Search in Meters. Only Object withhin the given point and radius are returned and sorted by distance. Random Sorting is disabled if the GeoFilter Informations are provided, (default:'null') Wiki geosort

parameters.name: polygon
parameters.description: valid WKT (Well-known text representation of geometry) Format, Examples (POLYGON ((30 10, 40 40, 20 40, 10 20, 30 10))) / By Using the GeoShapes Api (v1/GeoShapes) and passing Country.Type.Id OR Country.Type.Name Example (it.municipality.3066) / Bounding Box Filter bbc: 'Bounding Box Contains', 'bbi': 'Bounding Box Intersects', followed by a List of Comma Separated Longitude Latitude Tuples, 'null' = disabled, (default:'null') Wiki geosort

parameters.name: rancfilter

parameters.description: BeginDate of Events (Format: yyyy-MM-dd), (default: 'null')

parameters.name: enddate
parameters.description: EndDate of Events (Format: yyyy-MM-dd), (default: 'null')

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting Mode of Events ('asc': Ascending simple sort by next begindate, 'desc': simple descent sorting by next begindate, 'upcoming': Sort Events by next EventDate matching passed startdate, 'upcomingspecial': Sort Events by next EventDate matching passed startdate, multiple day events are showed at bottom, default: if no sort mode passed, sort by shortname )

parameters.name: updatefrom
parameters.description: Returns data changed after this date Format (yyyy-MM-dd), (default: 'null')

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description: Seed '1 - 10' for Random Sorting, '0' generates a Random Seed, 'null' disables Random Sorting, (default:null)

parameters.name: publishedon
parameters.description: Published On Filter (Separator ',' List of publisher IDs), (default:'null')

parameters.name: langfilter
parameters.description: Language filter (returns only data available in the selected Language, Separator ',' possible values: 'de,it,en,nl,sc,pl,fr,ru', 'null': Filter disabled)

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Filter by Source (Separator ','), (Sources available 'lts','trevilab','drin'),(default: 'null')

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: GeoFilter FLOAT Latitude Format: '46.624975', 'null' = disabled, (default:'null') Wiki geosort

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: GeoFilter FLOAT Longitude Format: '11.369909', 'null' = disabled, (default:'null') Wiki geosort

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Radius INTEGER to Search in Meters. Only Object withhin the given point and radius are returned and sorted by distance. Random Sorting is disabled if the GeoFilter Informations are provided, (default:'null') Wiki geosort

parameters.name: polygon
parameters.description: valid WKT (Well-known text representation of geometry) Format, Examples (POLYGON ((30 10, 40 40, 20 40, 10 20, 30 10))) / By Using the GeoShapes Api (v1/GeoShapes) and passing Country.Type.Id OR Country.Type.Name Example (it.municipality.3066) / Bounding Box Filter bbc: 'Bounding Box Contains', 'bbi': 'Bounding Box Intersects', followed by a List of Comma Separated Longitude Latitude Tuples, 'null' = disabled, (default:'null') Wiki geosort

parameters.name: odhactive
parameters.description: Odhactive (Published) data Filter (possible Values: 'true' only published data, 'false' only not published data, (default:'null')

parameters.name: visibleinsearch
parameters.description: Filter only Elements flagged with visibleinsearch: (possible values: 'true','false'), (default:'false')

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: GeoFilter FLOAT Latitude Format: '46.624975', 'null' = disabled, (default:'null') Wiki geosort

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: GeoFilter FLOAT Longitude Format: '11.369909', 'null' = disabled, (default:'null') Wiki geosort

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Radius INTEGER to Search in Meters. Only Object withhin the given point and radius are returned and sorted by distance. Random Sorting is disabled if the GeoFilter Informations are provided, (default:'null') Wiki geosort

parameters.name: polygon
parameters.description: valid WKT (Well-known text representation of geometry) Format, Examples (POLYGON ((30 10, 40 40, 20 40, 10 20, 30 10))) / By Using the GeoShapes Api (v1/GeoShapes) and passing Country.Type.Id OR Country.Type.Name Example (it.municipality.3066) / Bounding Box Filter bbc: 'Bounding Box Contains', 'bbi': 'Bounding Box Intersects', followed by a List of Comma Separated Longitude Latitude Tuples, 'null' = disabled, (default:'null') Wiki geosort

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Select fields to display, More fields are indicated by separator ',' example fields=Id,Active,Shortname (default:'null' all fields are displayed). Wiki fields

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language field selector, displays data and fields in the selected language (default:'null' all languages are displayed)

parameters.name: langfilter
parameters.description: Language filter (returns only data available in the selected Language, Separator ',' possible values: 'de,it,en,nl,sc,pl,fr,ru', 'null': Filter disabled)

parameters.name: updatefrom
parameters.description: Returns data changed after this date Format (yyyy-MM-dd), (default: 'null')

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description: Seed '1 - 10' for Random Sorting, '0' generates a Random Seed, 'null' disables Random Sorting, (default:null)

parameters.name: publishedon
parameters.description: Published On Filter (Separator ',' List of publisher IDs), (default:'null')

parameters.name: searchfilter
parameters.description: String to search for, Title in all languages are searched, (default: null) Wiki searchfilter

parameters.name: rawfilter
parameters.description: Wiki rawfilter

parameters.name: rawsort
parameters.description: Wiki rawsort

parameters.name: removenullvalues
parameters.description: Remove all Null values from json output. Useful for reducing json size. By default set to false. Documentation on Opendatahub Wiki

parameters.name: getasidarray
parameters.description: Get result only as Array of Ids, (default:false) Documentation on Opendatahub Wiki

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the requested data

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Select fields to display, More fields are indicated by separator ',' example fields=Id,Active,Shortname (default:'null' all fields are displayed). Wiki fields

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language field selector, displays data and fields in the selected language (default:'null' all languages are displayed)

parameters.name: removenullvalues
parameters.description: Remove all Null values from json output. Useful for reducing json size. By default set to false. Documentation on Opendatahub Wiki
